mapper.select: SELECT * FROM LIBRARY JOIN BOOKS ON LIBRARY.LB_CODE=BOOKS.BK_LCODE JOIN LIKED ON LIKED.LK_BCODE=BOOKS.BK_CODE and liked.lk_lcode=books.bk_lcode JOIN BIGGROUP ON BIGGROUP.BG_NUM=BOOKS.BK_BG_NUM JOIN SMALLGROUP ON SMALLGROUP.SG_BG_NUM=BIGGROUP.BG_NUM WHERE LIKED.LK_ID=#{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM LIKED
lk_bcode=#{likea.bk_code} AND lk_id=#{likea.id} AND lk_lcode=#{likea.lb_code}
